LanguageData.Apparel_CerebrexNode.label: cerebrex node
LanguageData.Apparel_CerebrexNode.description: An interlink node scavenged from the cerebrex core of a mechhive. It can be used to summon mechanoids or mechanoid transport pods from the planet-wide mechanoid satellite network.
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter.label: hunter pack
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter.description: A wearable pack that deploys a hunter drone. The drone will close with the target and detonate when it is within range.
LanguageData.Grenade_HunterPack.label: hunter pack capsule
